name: Text Styling in Figma
description:
Hey, #DataFam and #FigmaCommunity folks, recently I made a dataviz called "The Kame Legacy" where rather than using simple header texts I tried to experiment with the text elements to make it look more like a wordmark.

Here's a step-by-step guide to style texts in Figma to make such wordmarks yourself! You can also access my blog on the same here.
